title: Trump, Carson demand that next debate be limited to 2 hours, threaten boycott
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun: Breaking - Yesterday 
Republican presidential candidates Donald Trump and Ben Carson are threatening to boycott the next GOP debate over its proposed format, unde...
